titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 147) to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the Government pension offset and windfall elimination provisions.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 147) to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the Government pension offset and windfall elimination provisions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Doggett. Petition No: 109-15.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 147) to amend title II of the Social Security Act to repeal the Government pension offset and windfall elimination provisions.
